duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure all Bakery and Produce products meet high quality standards, product integrity guidelines, and are merchandised in innovative and eye-catching ways.
Mix, bake, decorate, and tray/bag product. Weigh, wrap, and use mandatory PLU codes to label/price packages.
Stock and rotate items as needed. Collaborate with leadership to order product and wrap. Report missing signs or tags to the Department Manager or Shelf Edge team.

Provide excellent customer service by answering product-related questions and helping Customers. May communicate preparation, safe handling, and nutritional aspects of products to Customers as needed.
Organize and clean prep areas, freezers, coolers, wareroom, and sales floor. Check shipments for out-of-date and damaged product to ensure freshness and quality.
Clean and sanitize department; properly operate/maintain equipment. Comply with department/store operating procedures and federal/state regulations.
